articles.title: EU could quickly approve Pfizer jab for 12-15 year olds: EMA chief - manilastandard.net
articles.description: The head of the European Medicines Agency said Monday that BioNTech/Pfizers jab against COVID-19 could be approved in the EU for 12- to 15-year-olds soon, perhaps as early as this month.
articles.content:
